price: او ويې فرمايل: په هماغې كې به ژوند كوئ او په هماغې كې به مرئ او له هماغې به راوېستل كيږئ.
arabic: قَالَ فِيهَا تَحۡيَوۡنَ وَفِيهَا تَمُوتُونَ وَمِنۡهَا تُخۡرَجُونَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: qāla fīhā taḥyawna wafīhā tamūtūna wamin'hā tukh'rajūna
